title: Facebook : annual revenue 2009 to 2019
summary: Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, and lastly slightly increasing from 2012 to 2015.
The line drastically increased by 2.5 times from Year 2009 to 2010, and lastly, increased by 1.9 times from Year 2010 to 2011.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 17928.0 was reached at Year 2015
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 777.0 was reached at Year 2009
